oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ein Urphänomen und seine Wirkung
Die Macht des Lichts und ihre ökonomischen Folgen
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Koubek, Norbert
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In June 2010 Professor Dr. Norbert Koubek gave his valedictory lecture. He retired after four decades in the Department of Business and Economics at the University of Wuppertal. In his lecture Light and its economic consequences as a fundamental phenomenon Professor Dr. Norbert Koubek refers to the innovation theory of Joseph A. Schumpeter and to the model of the so called Kondratieff waves and discusses the economic aspects of light.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fakultät für Wirtschaftswissenschaft/Schumpeter School of Business and Economics » Schumpeter Discussion Papers (SDP)
